text: Mohamed Bahari (born June 29, 1976 in Sidi Bel Abbes, Algeria) is a boxer from Algeria. Bahari won the bronze medal in the middleweight division (71â€“75 kg) at the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta. Bahari became a professional boxer in 2003. His last fight was in 2004. He retired with a record of 3-2-2. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Algerian boxers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Algeria
title: Mohamed Bahari
